ygData.subject: Re: fear plane
ygData.msgSnippet: On a newsgroup someone was saying how buggy Plane of Fear really is, a few things people said it was suppose to be like that, like a spell that ll hit you for
ygData.messageBody:
On a newsgroup someone was saying how buggy Plane of Fear really is, a few
things people said it was suppose to be like that, like a spell that'll hit
you for like 1,000 dmg. But this guy was saying a Lvl 1 Orge could go in
there and get by all these tough baddies and cause some major trains. For
one I'd like to know how a low lvl anything can get even close to this
place, luck? But someone replied to the post and said it was true a low lvl
player could do that.
I'd love to see this place at least once, seen screen shots but pics are
nothing I want to see the real deal.
Also heard the lag for this place (I take it is bad) was as bad as
Lavastorm. Since I haven't been to Lavastorm yet I wouldn't know, but if
it's as bad as Unrest the lag will have to suck.

**************************
Azor
Lvl 18 Human Cleric of the Rathe
**************************

> From: Mystik <mystik@...>
>
> i wouldn't consider going there till at least 40+...preferably 45+...and
in at
> least 2-3 full, well-rounded groups.....nasty place, but it's loads of fun
>
> (\/)ystix Spellchaser
> lv 46 and 1/2 human cleric of The Rathe
> (it's amazing how good specs are for exp that level...some green, but
sitll give
> exp..go fig)
>
> Azor wrote:
>
> > From: "Azor" <jmaynus@...>
> >
> > Yeah common for now, knowing Verant they'll change this one day. They
might
> > not but who knows. Anymore it seems like with every patch they make
another
> > item a lore or a No Drop item, they keep up with the No Drops and we
won't
> > be able to drop, sell or trade anything.
> > But anyways what lvl is the Plane of Fear?
> >
> > **************************
> > Azor
> > Lvl 18 Human Cleric of the Rathe
> > **************************
